# Core Command Package

This package is responsible for handling commands in the system.

## Installation

``` bash
composer require raid/core-command
```

## Security

If you discover any security-related issues, please email
instead of using the issue tracker.

## About Raid

Raid is a PHP framework created by **[Mohamed Khedr](https://github.com/MohamedKhedr700)**,
and it is maintained by **[Mohamed Khedr](https://github.com/MohamedKhedr700)**.

## Support Raid

Raid is an MIT-licensed open-source project. It's an independent project with its ongoing development made possible.
